display_long_description:
# WELCOME TO ZIX - EARLY ACCESS

**ZIX is a VR action roguelike** with a **deep combat system** and a **player-driven procedural world generation system**. **Team up with friends across platforms** as you remix runs and alter reality to uncover the mysteries of ZIX.

# 🧪 MIX THE WORLD
[media]
Harvest blessings from three strange worlds and fuse them together, creating your next trial. The ingredients don't just tweak numbers, they warp the fabric of reality. 

With **millions of possible combinations**, no two runs play the same.

# ✋ THE FIRST INSTINCT SYSTEM
[media]
**First Instinct** is ZIX’s custom-built movement & combat system. You’ll dash, wall-run, block, and hurl weapons using just two triggers and gestures that echo your intentions.
No face buttons. No menus. Nothing to distract you and break the trance.

# 🛠️ REMIX YOURSELF
[media]
Each run grants divine augments that rewire how you fight.
Teleport to thrown blades, shatter reality with explosive dashes, or rain precision arrows from above. Customize your look with arcane attachments and ritual markings.

# 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 BRING FRIENDS (OR DON’T)
[media]
**Play solo or in seamless 3-player co-op.**
Coordinate wild builds and face the chaos together—or apart. ZIX bends to your party’s will.

# 🧩 UNRAVEL WHAT’S HIDDEN
[media]
Symbols. Glitches. Secret paths.

**ZIX isn’t just a roguelike, it’s a mystery waiting to be stirred.**
